display_long_description:
# Save the galaxy from space pirates! 
Welcome, Agents, to **Hidden Pictures: Agent Q**, a puzzle-tastic space adventure that comes to life in your home! As an elite B.A.R.D. agent, your task is to stop the notorious Tumai, a band of space pirates, from stealing precious Galaxy Orbs.  

Use your powers of deduction to discover clues across over 60 worlds. Talk to locals (called Muddles) and help complete their tasks to locate Orb Shards before the Tumai do! Search intricate dioramas, bustling with life and filled with secrets, solve elaborate puzzles and fight bosses to ensure mission success! 
[media]
Explore exciting miniature worlds based on Museum, Western, Megacity and Halloween themes.
[media]
Each world has its own unique Tumai pirate to uncover. Find them, catch them, and you can add them to your pirate collection!
[media]
Pay close attention to the locals. Some will display items you need to locate in each world. Find one, return it, and you’ll get something useful!
[media]
Restore the Galaxy Orbs in Adventure Mode. Race against the clock and solve brain teasers in Puzzle Mode. And then face the ultimate threat by fighting giant Tumai in the Boss Mode!

**Hidden Pictures: Agent Q** is an exciting puzzle game for all ages:
- Explore 60+ fun-sized worlds
- Discover hidden items and collectables
- Solve colorful timed puzzles
- Complete rhythm challenges
- Uncover hidden Tumai pirates 
- Complete Tumai and Muddle collections
